snippet: Joey Logano won in a controversial finish at Talladega Superspeedway in Alabama, sweeping the second round of Nascar’s playoffs and ending Dale Earnhardt Jr.’s championship chances.
abstract: Joey Logano wins auto race at Talladega Superspeedway in Alabama; other racing news noted.

keywords.value: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: Joey Logano won in a controversial finish at Talladega Superspeedway in Alabama, sweeping the second round of Nascar’s playoffs and ending Dale Earnhardt Jr.’s championship chances.
